hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE9$ tens and $\blueE4$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/193e9e8b9e61ca125d5db613c8110d1d95ffb9e2)

There are $\blueE{94}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD4$ tens and $\maroonD{1}$ one. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8577ab6e39e07d08c15d9e8d77b845095cc2f017)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{41}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{94}-\maroonD{41}$, the difference is $\blueE{53}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5de1456567b5d7fe4752e54bca0a78928b64392d)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$94 - 41 = 53$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/3cde4525ea2e6060286510280f954fa7e73468b6)

[[☃ radio 1]]
